text: Mirko Guadalupi (born 9 February 1987) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Team Altamura. ==Club career== On 5 July 2018, he joined Serie D club Team Altamura. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1987 births Category:People from Brindisi Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Living people Category:A.C.
